<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Address Runes Balance</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/runes/{nameOrId}/addresses/{address}/balances"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get rune balance by address and rune name or ID.
